description:
There are not much of Matlab courses available out there. They basically either jump directly to programming code, and leaving the rest behind, or focus mainly on the basics of Matlab without giving it's programming features a try.

So, you may have to buy two courses to be good in Matlab. In this course I put all my effort to start with Matlab basics, and then after we have a strong foundation we move to the next level.

We will learn:

  • Matlab user interface.
  • Basic Arithmetic in Matlab.
  • Symbolic Calculations in Matlab
  • Algebra.
  • Calculus.
  • Data Visualizations.
  • Programming fundamentals.
  • GUI in Matlab.
  • Deploying your built apps


And all of that is completely FREE, and step by step guide.

THROUGH beginning until you become an expert in Matlab.
title: Learning Matlab from Scratch
